attributes.action: Stop the Unfair Immigration Rule Against Healthcare Workers in the UK
attributes.additional_details: 1. Reassess and revoke the rule barring healthcare workers from bringing dependants to the UK. 2. Consult with healthcare professionals to understand impacts. 3. Enact legislation ensuring equal family reunification rights for all skilled workers. 4. Increase decision-making transparency and fairness. 5. Acknowledge and support healthcare workers' contributions by safeguarding their rights in immigration policies.
attributes.background: Reverse the rule preventing UK healthcare workers from bringing dependants. Ensure equal family rights for all skilled professionals and respect their contributions to our health system.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652784
